    public interface IJavetClosable
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    The interface Javet closable is for recycling the unmanaged resource.

    Why AutoCloseable is not feasible? AutoCloseable requires the implementation to handle checked exception, however, JavetException is supposed to be handled by the caller. This interface allows throwing the JavetException in close().

    Since:
    0.7.0
